mapper.select: select * from board where num = #{num} and valid = 'I'
mapper.update: update board set views= views + 1 where num = #{num} and valid = 'I'
update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, file = #{file}, views = #{views} where num = #{num} and valid = 'I'
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, contents, writer, file) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{file})
